feed.title: Detect, Modulate, Integrate&Transfer Unit - Shared Experience Lifelong Learning

entry.title: ShELL is underway
entry.content:
Loughborough University, Vanderbilt University and the University of Texas at Dallas have started to work on the DARPA-funded ShELL project.

Please check out our press release.
entry.summary: Loughborough University, Vanderbilt University and the University of Texas at Dallas have started to work on the DARPA-funded ShELL project. Please check out our press release.
